title: The troublesome raigne and lamentable death of Edward the second, King of England with the tragicall fall of proud Mortimer: as it was sundrie times publiquely acted in the honourable citie of London, by the right honourable the Earle of Pembrooke his seruants. Written by Chri. Marlow Gent.
author: Marlowe, Christopher, 1564-1593.
publicationStmtPublisher: [By R. Robinson] for William Iones dwelling neere Holbourne conduit, at the signe of the Gunne,
